response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its worth to both us and you, I'm proposing to sell it to you for $180. This offer includes a special warranty and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further details.", "product_price": 180}
